Key.Name: AutoScaleEnabled
Key.SummaryComment: Whether the pool size should automatically adjust over time.
Key.RemarksComment: <para>If false, one of the <see cref="TargetDedicatedComputeNodes"/> or <see cref="TargetLowPriorityComputeNodes"/> property is required.</para> <para>If true, the <see cref="AutoScaleFormula"/> property is required. The pool automatically resizes according to the formula.</para> <para>The default value is false.</para>

Key.Name: ApplicationPackageReferences
Key.SummaryComment: A list of application package references to be installed on each compute node in the pool.

Key.Name: AutoScaleEvaluationInterval
Key.SummaryComment: A time interval at which to automatically adjust the pool size according to the <see cref="AutoScaleFormula"/>.
Key.RemarksComment: The default value is 15 minutes. The minimum allowed value is 5 minutes.

Key.Name: AutoScaleFormula
Key.SummaryComment: A formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: <para>For how to write autoscale formulas, see https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/batch-automatic-scaling/. This property is required if <see cref="AutoScaleEnabled"/> is set to true. It must be null if AutoScaleEnabled is false.</para><para>The formula is checked for validity before the pool is created. If the formula is not valid, an exception is thrown when you try to commit the <see cref="PoolSpecification"/>.</para>

Key.Name: CloudServiceConfiguration
Key.SummaryComment: The <see cref="CloudServiceConfiguration"/> for the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: This property is mutually exclusive with <see cref="VirtualMachineConfiguration"/>.

Key.Name: CertificateReferences
Key.SummaryComment: A list of certificates to be installed on each compute node in the pool.

Key.Name: DisplayName
Key.SummaryComment: The display name for the pool.

Key.Name: InterComputeNodeCommunicationEnabled
Key.SummaryComment: Whether the pool permits direct communication between its compute nodes.
Key.RemarksComment: Enabling inter-node communication limits the maximum size of the pool due to deployment restrictions on the nodes of the pool. This may result in the pool not reaching its desired size.

Key.Name: NetworkConfiguration
Key.SummaryComment: The network configuration of the pool.

Key.Name: TaskSlotsPerNode
Key.SummaryComment: The number of task slots that can be used to run concurrent tasks on a single compute node in the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: The default value is 1. The maximum value is the smaller of 4 times the number of cores of the <see cref="VirtualMachineSize"/> of the pool or 256.

Key.Name: Metadata
Key.SummaryComment: A list of name-value pairs associated with the pool as metadata.

Key.Name: ResizeTimeout
Key.SummaryComment: The timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: <para>This timeout applies only to manual scaling; it has no effect when <see cref="AutoScaleEnabled"/> is set to true.</para><para>The default value is 15 minutes. The minimum value is 5 minutes.</para>

Key.Name: TaskSchedulingPolicy
Key.SummaryComment: How tasks are distributed among compute nodes in the pool.

Key.Name: StartTask
Key.SummaryComment: A task to run on each compute node as it joins the pool. The task runs when the node is added to the pool or when the node is restarted.

Key.Name: TargetDedicatedComputeNodes
Key.SummaryComment: The desired number of dedicated compute nodes in the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: This setting cannot be specified if <see cref="AutoScaleEnabled"/> is set to true. At least one of this property and <see cref="TargetLowPriorityComputeNodes"/> must be specified if <see cref="AutoScaleEnabled"/> is false. If not specified, the default is 0.

Key.Name: TargetLowPriorityComputeNodes
Key.SummaryComment: The desired number of low-priority compute nodes in the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: This setting cannot be specified if <see cref="AutoScaleEnabled"/> is set to true. At least one of <see cref="TargetDedicatedComputeNodes"/> and this property must be specified if <see cref="AutoScaleEnabled"/> is false. If not specified, the default is 0.

Key.Name: UserAccounts
Key.SummaryComment: The list of user accounts to be created on each node in the pool.

Key.Name: VirtualMachineConfiguration
Key.SummaryComment: The <see cref="VirtualMachineConfiguration"/> of the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: This property is mutually exclusive with <see cref="CloudServiceConfiguration"/>.

Key.Name: VirtualMachineSize
Key.SummaryComment: The size of the virtual machines in the pool.  All virtual machines in a pool are the same size.
Key.RemarksComment: <para>For information about available sizes of virtual machines in pools, see Choose a VM size for compute nodes in an Azure Batch pool (https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/batch/batch-pool-vm-sizes).</para>

Key.Name: ApplicationLicenses
Key.SummaryComment: The list of application licenses the Batch service will make available on each compute node in the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: The list of application licenses must be a subset of available Batch service application licenses.

Key.Name: MountConfiguration
Key.SummaryComment: A list of file systems to mount on each node in the pool.
Key.RemarksComment: This supports Azure Files, NFS, CIFS/SMB, and Blobfuse.
